Author: Sam Boutros
Summary: In Azure Microsoft has a large list of VM templates that can be used in the Gallery to provision VMs. These VMs come with few pre-configured features to facilitate secure powershell remoting into the VMs:- WinRM is enabled and configured to listen on HTTPS port 5986- A certificat
Title: Powershell script to set remote powershell session with Azure VMs
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Powershell, Powershell remoting to Azure VM
